Wczytujemy dane z excela
```{r}
library(XLConnect)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
library(forecast)
df <- read_excel('Lara-dane2.xlsx', sheet = 1)
df$Godzina<-substr(df$Godzina,12,16)
df$Data<-as.Date(df$Data,)

head(df)
```


